title: Muting in TFT
body:
It'd be nice if they added the muting options to TFT. I don't mute too many people normally, but once people start being toxic or spamming pings, it gets frustrating and I usually just mute and move on. I just hope they add the muting options to TFT soon.
{{sticker:sg-janna}}

replies.body: I propose no chat at all. Remove it.

> [{quoted}](name=Busty Demon,realm=EUNE,application-id=RaE1aOE7,discussion-id=QuvK4czV,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2019-07-14T08:41:21.107+0000)
>
> I propose no chat at all. Remove it.

No Chat. No Pings

All for it.

Full mute does not mute their dance sounds.  The griffins will continue to spam their puppy-torturing screetchs, and there's NOTHING YOU CAN DO ABOUT IT NO MATTER WHAT AND IT WILL LAST THE ENTIRE GAME BECAUSE THERE'S NO WAY TO MUTE THEM EXCEPT TO TURN OFF YOUR ENTIRE SOUND SYSTEM TO YOUR COMPTUER!

FIX THIS ALREADY PLEASE WE'RE DYING HERE!
Just type " /mute all " and it will mute everything including pings
you can /mute people (and /fullmute for pings and whatnot)

Sure, but there's no option to just mute everyone.  Case matters, typing is annoying especially since the command line isn't smart enough for tab completion.

Generally, +1 to easy ways to mute.
If they spam pings they aren't scouting your team. Sounds like a win to me.
So everyone can laugh at how busted the team with 100 hp at round 23 is
